turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. May I place an order for Bella Luna for pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can do that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four, small pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what types of pizzas did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have all for those cheese lovers and also all for gluten free crust, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 small pizzas, all cheese lovers with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get your order right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total for that is $48.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect, i've placed the order at bella lunas. it'll be ready in 25 minutes for pick.
